mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_types (type_code, type_name, description, icon, sort_order, is_active, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{typeCode}, #{typeName}, #{description}, #{icon}, #{sortOrder}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, type_code, type_name, description, icon, sort_order, is_active, create_time, update_time FROM question_types ORDER BY sort_order, id
SELECT id, type_code, type_name, description, icon, sort_order, is_active, create_time, update_time FROM question_types WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY sort_order, id
